com.vtls.opensource.xml
Class URIResolver

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.xml.URIResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
URIResolver
public class URIResolver
extends Object
implements URIResolver

This class is used to resolve imports in stylesheets. Its constructor can take a parameter which will tell the classloader where to look for the file.

Field Summary
protected  String path
          The path inside the classloader.
 
Constructor Summary
URIResolver()
          Default with no path.
URIResolver(String _path)
          Sets the path.
 
Method Summary
 Source resolve(String _href, String _base)
          Returns a SourceStream of the stylesheet.

Field Detail

path

protected String path
The path inside the classloader.

Constructor Detail

URIResolver

public URIResolver()
Default with no path. Stylesheets must be in the root of a JAR file.

URIResolver

public URIResolver(String _path)
Sets the path. Stylesheets must be in that path in a JAR file.

Parameters:
_path - The path inside a JAR file where the stylesheet(s) reside(s).
Method Detail

public Source resolve(String _href,
                      String _base)
Returns a SourceStream of the stylesheet.

_base -
Returns:
A StreamSource containing the stylesheet.
